attributes.action: Restrict HGV GVW in towns and city's
attributes.additional_details:
Restrict HGV's enterring town's cities and villages to the former 38t GVW on five/six axles, 40' trailer length and 13' 8.5" max height. Reducing bridge bashing, traffic accidents wear and tear on roads and driver stress.
Vehicles above these restrictions to use arterial routes only. Distribution Centres to be resited adjacent to these routes.
